triples.name: Fuzzy logic
triples.relevance: Core technique for designing the fuzzy state observer and fuzzy adaptive control system.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Fundamental recursive control design methodology used for the adaptive output-feedback backstepping control scheme.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Mathematical tool for constructing logarithm Lyapunov functions to prove system stability and SGUUB property.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Foundational field covering feedback control systems and control design methodologies.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Core technique for handling uncertain strict-feedback nonlinear systems with unknown parameters.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Novel adaptive design methodology that adjusts control parameters for systems with unknown virtual and actual control gain functions.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: Fuzzy state observer design for estimating unmeasurable system states from measured outputs.

triples.name: Stability theory
triples.relevance: Mathematical framework for analyzing and proving semiglobally uniformly ultimately boundedness (SGUUB) of the proposed control system.
